doc.after: There are no railways waterways ports or harbours on the island 64 Loading jetties are located at Kingston and Cascade but ships cannot get close to either of them When a supply ship arrives it is emptied by whaleboats towed by launches five tonnes at a time Which jetty is used depends on the prevailing weather on the day The jetty on the leeward side of the island is often used If the wind changes significantly during unloading loading the ship will move around to the other side Visitors often gather to watch the activity when a supply ship arrives
